description:
Johnson&Johnson is looking for Trainee/Jr Specialist in Quality department

 

Major Responsibilities :

  • Study of local quality regulations, creation and maintenance documentation database
  • Control and approval of packaging models, specifications, FAI
  • Approval of local co-packing activities and ensuring co-packing process in accordance with J&J regulations
  • Handling with non-compliance and complaints from customers
  • Other projects

Requirements:

  • Higher education or last course students from recognized university (full-time);
  • Motivation to work and develop in Quality Assurance;
  • Relevant experience is highly appreciated;
  • Good command of English;
  • Accuracy, attentiveness to details;
  • Ability to work under pressure;
  • Readiness to routine work

Conditions:

  • Great opportunity for further development in Quality Assurance department;
  • Appropriate salary;
  • Subsidized meals;
  • Medical insurance
name: Trainee in Quality Assurance department
